Durrkeswaran a/l Ganasan (born 5 July 1997 in Malaysia) is a Malaysian professional footballer who currently plays as a left-back or left-midfielder for Malaysia Super League club Melaka.
Club career
Negeri Sembilan
Durrkeswaran made his senior debut with  Negeri Sembilan in 2018.
PDRM
In 2021, Durrkeswaran joined Malaysia Premier League club PDRM.
Harini
In 2023, Harini signed Durrkeswaran for free from PDRM.
Melaka
For the 2024 season, Durrkeswaran began a new journey by signing a contract with Melaka. He successfully led Melaka to win the 2024–25 Malaysia A1 Semi-Pro League and was promoted to the 2025–26 Malaysia Super League.
Honours
Club
;Melaka
*Malaysia A1 Semi-Pro League: 2024–25
